ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Interesting text (WAS:Interesting Giant in Warsliks Woods (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m still trying to figure out what it means when you see the text message You sense you are being watched  Anyone know?  This has been bugging me for a
ygData.messageBody:
Sartori wrote:

> Again, speaking of interesting text: While we were in Hate one night,
> occasionally we were getting some unusual messages like, "you here a
> stirring in the distance" or "you hear the wailing of the
> dead all around
> you".

I'm still trying to figure out what it means when you see the text message
"You sense you are being watched" Anyone know? This has been bugging me
for a while.

> "You hear something
> feasting on the flesh
> of the dead" or something to that effect.

Heh, some GM's been watching The 13th Warrior I bet. ;^)

Congrats on 54, btw!

Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Tunare
